nodes.label: AI used to infer emotions of a natural person

question.prompt: Is the AI system used to infer emotions of a natural person?

items.label: Recital (18)
items.text: Defines emotion recognition and clarifies exclusions (physical states like fatigue; mere detection of expressions unless used to infer emotions).

items.label: Recital (44)
items.text: Serious concerns about reliability and generalisability; intrusive nature can lead to discrimination, especially given workplace/education power imbalances.
